UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Assessment of in vitro activities of novel modified antimicrobial peptides against clarithromycin resistant Mycobacterium abscessus.
Literature.Author: Sudadech P, Roytrakul S, Kaewprasert O, Sirichoat A, Chetchotisakd P, Kanthawong S, Faksri K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:6.34±4.98% Hemolysis=25 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:9.15±1.99% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:11.44±0.25% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Human PBMC:2.02% Cytotoxicity=6.25 µg/ml,Human PBMC:61.24% Cytotoxicity=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium abscessus ATCC 19977(MIC=200µg/ml),Mycobacterium abscessus MAB01(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Mycobacterium abscessus MAB02(MIC=>400µg/ml),Mycobacterium abscessus MAB03(MIC=6.25µg/ml)
